ingredients: 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons baking powder, 1 tablespoon white sugar, ¼ teaspoon salt, 1 cup vanilla-flavored almond milk, ½ cup low-fat vanilla Greek yogurt (such as Cabot®), 1 lemon, zested and juiced
directions: Step 1: Whisk flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt together in a large bowl. Step 2: Mix almond milk, yogurt, egg, lemon zest and juice, and almond extract together in a separate bowl; stir in butter. Add to the flour mixture; stir just until smooth and gently fold in blueberries. Step 3: Preheat a lightly oiled griddle or large skillet over medium-high heat. For each pancake, pour approximately 1/4 cup of batter onto the hot griddle. Step 4: Cook until the pancakes start to lightly bubble and edges begin to dry, 3 to 4 minutes. Flip and continue cooking until lightly browned and cooked through, 1 to 2 minutes.
